title: `install()` returns None not Dataset instance

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
Happening on windows: https://ci.appveyor.com/api/buildjobs/0dhdwhy706yvdv03/log
```
[00:03:57] ======================================================================
[00:03:57] ERROR: datalad_neuroimaging.tests.test_dicomconv.test_dicom_metadata_aggregation
[00:03:57] ----------------------------------------------------------------------
[00:03:57] Traceback (most recent call last):
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
[00:03:57]     self.test(*self.arg)
[00:03:57]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 661, in newfunc
[00:03:57]     return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
[00:03:57]   File "c:\projects\datalad-neuroimaging\datalad_neuroimaging\tests\test_dicomconv.py", line 28, in test_dicom_metadata_aggregation
[00:03:57]     dicoms = get_dicom_dataset('structural')
[00:03:57]   File "c:\projects\datalad-neuroimaging\datalad_neuroimaging\tests\utils.py", line 17, in get_dicom_dataset
[00:03:57]     ok_clean_git(ds.path)
[00:03:57] AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'path'
```

in this code

```
def get_dicom_dataset(flavor):
    ds = install(
        dataset=normpath(opj(_modpath, pardir)),
        path=opj(_modpath, 'tests', 'data', 'dicoms', flavor))
    # fail on any "surprising" changes made to this dataset
    ok_clean_git(ds.path)
    return ds
```
